name: AP_CLAIM_PRICER_HX
description: This table contains historical information for adjudications that invoked the Epic Pricer.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ASSOC_CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The vendor contract associated with Epic Pricer message record.

columns.name: ASSOC_CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: USED_FOR_PRICE_YN
columns.description: This value is set to Yes if the associated Epic Pricer message record was used to price the claim. When comparing contracts, the Epic Pricer message record may not have been used for the final pricing of the claim.

columns.name: PRICER_INVOKED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The recorded timestamp of when the Epic Pricer was invoked by adjudication.

columns.name: PRICER_MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Epic Pricer message record.
